snippet.title: Bloodborne Kart: Battle Mode First Playable
snippet.description:
Music by The Noble Demon: https://youtu.be/1hs9-8RlSZA
Follow on twitter for frequent updates: https://twitter.com/b0tster

Excited to show off the new battle mode for Bloodborne Kart!

This video demonstrates a 'team battle' mode where racers have to kill enemies on the opposing team to score points, but there will also be more game types in the future like capture the flag, elimination, free for all ect.

There are also other features in this mode worth mentioning, like a sudden death state to discourage tied matches and 'special power ups' that spawn on a timer on specific points in the map. One of these special power ups is the piercing (sniper) rifle, which is exclusive to battle mode.
